an3.144:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has three qualities has reached the ultimate end, the ultimate sanctuary, the ultimate spiritual life, the ultimate goal. They are the best among gods and humans.
an3.144:1.3: A demonstration of psychic power, a demonstration of revealing, and a demonstration of instruction.
an3.144:1.4: A mendicant with these three qualities has reached the ultimate end, the ultimate sanctuary, the ultimate spiritual life, the ultimate goal. They are the best among gods and humans.”
